case.state: My name is Elesa. I'm a model. I also happen to be your opponent for tonight.
My name is Elesa. I'm a model. I also happen to be your opponent for tonight.
Don't disappoint me.
Welcome to the main stage.
Alright. Whose star shall shine brightest, I wonder...?
Don't think I wouldn't recognize you. You and your little group of white knights put Unova in peril.
All of us Gym Leaders know who you are, N. I cannot ignore the fact you tried to liberate all Pokemon from their trainers.
To think I once disregarded you as just another trainer. What a coincidence that Team Plasma's leader challenges me again.
...I have a bad feeling about what's to come.
...I have a bad feeling about what's to come.
Don't think I wouldn't recognize you. You and your little group of white knights put Unova in peril.
All of us Gym Leaders know who you are, N. I cannot ignore the fact you tried to liberate all Pokemon from their trainers.
To think I once disregarded you as just another trainer. What a coincidence that Team Plasma's leader challenges me again.
Kanto's Water-type specialist. Ah, right, I recall seeing you at the Pokemon World Tournament.
Cynthia. It's always a pleasure to run into you.
Typical street punk. Very well. Let's start.
Never seen retractable sunglasses? Maybe you're too young for that...
Kanto's Water-type specialist. Ah, right, I recall seeing you at the Pokemon World Tournament.
...Huh. It wasn't just the tint of the shades. You actually wore that.
Who's this one? She seems... feisty.
Already trying to outdo me? We'll see how things go.
Please, no pictures.
...Is that a firearm?
Never seen this Pokemon before. Looks dangerous...
I should get one of those for the gym...
That's some outfit you've got. I'm not sure I could show that much cleavage...
I didn't realize this was clothing-optional. Then again, I should've expected...
...Not a Fire-type fan, I take it? Luckily, I'm an Electric trainer.
...Why do I get the feeling you don't actually want me here?
Not even a shirt? You'd fit right in with Marlon, I suppose.
...Friend of Wake's?
Is that... cane necessary? We won't be going anywhere.
Can someone turn down the spotlight, please? Maybe make it less blue?
Fashion trends of other worlds are always so strange...
Wings, huh? That's a first.
I'm getting a regal feeling here...
I never had the patience for hair dye to that extent... you're a braver woman than I am.
This will not be a pleasant game, I can tell.
Do you... need help?
That thing's off, right?
Got a bad feeling about what's to come.
Don't disappoint me.
Welcome to the main stage.
Alright. Whose star shall shine brightest, I wonder...?
Hmm? Here. Take ~cards~.
Okay... ~cards~.
~Cards~. Thank you.
If I could get ~cards~, that'd be great.
I got room for ~cards~ over here.
Can I get ~cards~? Oh, but, no rush.
Alright! Can I get ~cards~ over here?
Oh Dealer, such a card. Speaking of, ~cards~.
~Cards~. Let's do this!
I wonder which of you will lose this one...
If we can just move on...
Hardly worth the effort.
Just the hand I needed!
Safe and secure this time around.
I have total confidence in this hand. Try and beat it!
Show me the money!
Do you think you can beat me?
Hey. Good luck.
Let's get this rolling, huh?
Passable. At best.
The bog standard. What? Not every hand is going to be amazing.
Let the chips fall where they may. ...Oh, right. No chips in this game.
Keep it choppy, please.
I consider myself a high-roller. Do you?
Do you always go this slow?
Well?
Oh, no. Take your time.
My, this has really gotten exhilarating!
Starting to sweat a little here!
I gotta hand it to you, you've got a great poker face, ~player~.
This could go either way... it really is just like Pokemon battling.
Will this be enough? Who can say?
Wait a minute, wait a minute. You ain't heard nothin' yet!
Kind of unremarkable, really.
Things are going smooth, all things considered.
Are you prepared, ~player~? We wouldn't want to continue without you.
Take your time. This hand's not going anywhere.
Utterly ridiculous.
Feh.
Not worth my time.
Backed into a corner again... sends tingles up my spine!
Despite how desperate the situation is, I'm actually enjoying myself!
Things are getting tense. Oh, how exciting!
I suspect you've fared better than myself.
Gym Leaders are used to facing disadvantages in battle. This is nothing!
Oh. That's... not what I was hoping for.
Mother of mercy, is this the end of Elesa!?
Enjoy your win, everyone. I'm certainly not getting it.
You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?
That's the point. My outfits are designed to be interesting.
Well, my outfit's uniquely Unovan. Just like yours is uniquely of Falana. That's the beauty of fashion.
Who says I can't have both?
I'll give you points for trying, but can you really say that when you wear a patchy hat like that?
This isn't a competition. And even if it were, I wouldn't lose.
How very cute. Maybe you can beat me... when you're older.
I'll pass, thank you. If I wanted a 'demonic flair', I'd go find Grimsley.
No need to apologize. You might not be mature enough for the fashion world, but I promise there are plenty out there who'd want to see you.
I sincerely hope you aren't here to cause any more trouble. I'm here to enjoy myself tonight.
I have my eye on you.
My glasses might be a bit more high-tech than what you're used to.

state.text: I'll have to admit---you're a tough opponent, ~leader~.
You're not half-bad, ~leader~, I'll give you that.

case.state: You're surprisingly knowledgeable about euphemisms...

condition.saying: how do you get it like that

case.state: Oh, it's nothing special. They're just hair extensions.

state.text: Huh. You're pretty good at this game, ~leader~. I always enjoy a challenge.
You're really good at this game, ~leader~! But a Gym Leader doesn't give up until the very end!

case.state: Last round of the game! It's just like getting a gym leader down to their last Pokemon! Alright, ~opponent~, let's see who comes out victorious!
I'm quite curious about the fashion trends where you're all from. Any favorite outfits?

Carpe diem. Seize the day. Make your lives extraordinary...
Do you understand? The risk makes it exciting!
Well, since I'm getting to enjoy everyone's company, here's a question; what sort of movies do you enjoy? I was always a bit of a film fanatic when I was younger.
This is warm to you?
I appreciate the suggestion, Meia, but space travel isn't exactly... common.
Final boss? I'm a gym leader; I'm not meant to look that imposing.
What was that?
Oh, yes. Assault a gym leader in public; the police would be on you before you could pull your fist back.
Yeah, laugh it up. I know what I got myself into.
As it so happens, it is.
Is that so? You look rather fashionable yourself.
I'd say you're doing fine, but if you insist, perhaps you can try one of the brands I represent.
It's not something I mind.
I'm not trying to act like anyone.
As a model, I have to be proud of it!
Ah. So I did.
Easy for you to say. You came here in a swimsuit, for Arceus's sake.
Not everyone is so... blatant with their staring. You should follow their example.
It's a lot like a large blanket, actually. Certainly more functional than a flimsy cape.
You can see my midriff, which I think says enough.
Don't be ridiculous. My style emulates many things, but I don't go full Emolga.
And? It's okay to get excited in a game like this!
I'm a well-known model, yes.
Oh? You know a model as well?
They're separate. Be a little more patient- and good at the game- and I can demonstrate.
Hmm... I think I need more information to help. But maybe this can wait?
It's a long story...
Oh, do you recognize me?
Depends on whether or not I'm on the job, Sakura. Now? I'd say I am.
Yes, of course. Our designers are pretty good about that.
Sure, I suppose. But I'd like to touch those wings in turn.
You're familiar with me?
Where are you looking, Angel Boy?
Only if you make it weird.
I'm a clothing model, not a nude model.
Black and White...? What are you on about?
Twice in a row, huh?
You're kidding, right? Three times? I know I'm not the best at this game, but this is ridiculous!
Are you kidding me!?
This is absolutely ridiculous! Is this game rigged against me?
I'm the first? This hardly seems fair at all!
It seems my fame's worked against me this time. To be the first loser... Let's not make this a trend.
Hmph. So the supermodel is the first person to strip tonight. Well then...
And here I thought I could ride the whole thing out.
Got your act together, did we?
Finally. I thought you were leaving me out intentionally.
Here's where my look starts to fall apart. Granted, considering all of you...
Guess it was inevitable my ensemble would be messed with.
Think I can coordinate as well out of my clothes as in them?
Prepare to be disappointed.
You seem proud of that one.
Let's not drag this out.
This is where things get spicy.
You've all done well so far. Would you like a reward?
I'll catch up quick, don't you worry.
Seems I was fashion-ably late to the indecent party.
Better late than never, huh?
Well, why not at this point, right?
I was hoping I could avoid this, but...
Now's not the time to crack under pressure. I'll stand strong.
Down to the wire!
Don't worry, I can make things more interesting later on. Just bear with the small stuff for now.
Let's tone it down.
I can afford to be a little pickier now, don't you think?
Let's not waste time, then.
I'll try and make this interesting.
How prepared are you, I wonder...
Well done. I was actually trying that round.
Let's tone it down.
Nicely done. I wasn't expecting you to do so well.
I continue to underestimate you. But no more.
You clearly have potential. I'm not sure why I pretended you didn't.
If you think I'll be shaking from something like this, lemme stop you right there.
Heh. Not bad.
You're really gonna push me this far?
Again? You're really not stopping for anything.
Well, it was a matter of time...
O-Oh... hmm.
Are you excited? You should be.
For the record, that was my only coat. Don't expect anything that flashy again.
Let's tone it down.
I can afford to be a little pickier now, don't you think?
So soon?
Don't you have someone else to target?
It seems my fame's worked against me this time.
I get you're all eager, but please calm yourselves.
I hardly see how this is fair.
If this is an excuse to see my designer clothes better, you could have asked like normal people.
This one may actually work in my favor.
Well, well. The joke's on you.
Fair enough. But now, things are looking up for me.
Oh... well, far be it from me to disappoint a crowd...
Ouch. I felt that one.
You're pretty merciless, huh?
What rotten luck.
This is like the equivalent of Thunder missing three times in a row. Not fun.
I thought I was better than this.
I thought I could wing it. Guess that's why I never became a Flying-type trainer.
Is there, like, a ref who can verify none of you were cheating?
Not... my best night.
Thank you... do you like my outfit's design? Evocative of a Zebstrika. It's all well-thought out, you know.
But if you want beauty, consider these headphones. Do you see the red and blue? They're like magnets.
Roxie here is more of an expert on that type of style.
I suppose you have a point. I already have a reputation as a cold and distant Gym Leader.
Thank you... do you like the color scheme? It's all well-thought out, you know.
You think this is hurting me? Hardly.
That just sounds like a Plusle and Minun. ...Are they a Plusle and Minun?
You like music, Cynthia?
Honestly, I've been thinking about it, and I think that's your big problem, Guzma: you're impatient to a fault.
It's undeniable, really.
Maybe I can even hook you up a discount.
It's really no different from a belt.
But if you want beauty, consider these shoes. Do you see the red and blue? They're like magnets.
Less than you'd think...
Are you implying something?
I'm fine, thank you!
Yeah, you're right. Although usually it's the clothes people are interested in...
No, I'm pretty sure I will.
They are, aren't they? The designer did a fantastic job.
It is, in fact, a buckle. Surprised?
I'd be insulted if you didn't, Kazuma.
Kazuma, please. A great model always knows the condition of her clothes.
I am an Electric-type trainer. Nothing more, nothing less.
They're all part of the look, although, yes, they help drown out the white noise as well.
I can remove it myself, thank you. You just need to manhandle it a little...
Don't pretend that you know my history.
I take it your schedule is free a lot, Chazz?
So I've noticed. It suits you well, although might I suggest a different, shorter stocking over wraps?
I like to always have something on in the background, Megumin.
Yes, a button. Watch and learn!
That's not quite how it worked. Although that is an idea.
I wouldn't consider myself much more busty than you, Megumin.
I have a friend named Roxie who's style would be right up your alley, I believe.
We still can be, if you wish.
It wasn't really any trouble...
Of course you can't. My whole career is based around the electrifying potential of Electric-types.
I get what I model for free, but I buy clothes like anyone else.
Just gotta finagle it a little... it's usually not this tricky.
Thank you. I'll face any and all obstacles... and come out sparkling!
Sorry, I was listening to local artists.
Does this Number Three...?
The sacrifices I make for fashion...
It'd be bad for both of us, I imagine.
Send your feedback to the designers, then. I'm sure they'd be interested to hear it.
Well, not you specifically, but yes.
Please phrase that some other way.
I think you'll be pleasantly surprised, Pit.
...Shame you're not a Pokemon Trainer, Pit. You've got the compassion to be one.
This is it for me... Be honest, were you waiting all night for this?
(sigh) At least I knew what I was getting into. Looks like tonight is your lucky night.
I shouldn't be rewarding you, but rules are rules. Looks like you'll be seeing a naked model tonight.
This is it for me... Be honest, were you waiting this whole time for it?
(sigh) At least I knew what I was getting into. Looks like today's your lucky day..
I shouldn't be rewarding you, but rules are rules. Looks like you'll be seeing a naked model today.
It's always difficult taking this off. ~player~, could you help me?
Ugh, this is always a hassle... Could someone help me?
There's no rule preventing the players from helping each other strip, right? Because I might need some assistance.
Let's start off small.
Not much will change from this. Aside from, perhaps, feeling a tad shorter.
When you're a model, being able to walk gracefully in any heels is an absolute must.
Instead of removing the headphones, I'll just remove the extensions. They can actually be a hassle sometimes.
I'm just gonna remove the extensions and keep these babies on. What was I listening to? Woman's secret.
Fashion can be functional, you know. But these extensions were just for aesthetic.
It's going to feel quite strange without this on. This is what completes the outfit.
What would you call this? A vest? A jacket? An overshirt? Front-cut chemise? Even I'm not certain what exactly this is myself.
If this were a coat, I'd take this off with more... pizzazz.
Looks like we're getting to the major stuff.
(Am I seriously doing this?)
What happens here stays here. None of you are to say a word, capiche?
Do you know what they call me...?
Fun fact about these shoes: they're meant to resemble the ends of magnets.
The clashing colors make quite an impression, don't you agree?
Not much will change from this. Aside from, perhaps, feeling a tad shorter.
Finally, I can hear at full volume.
What was I listening to? Woman's secret.
Fashion can be functional, you know.
Hmpff... Give me a moment---you really need to press down hard on that button.
I guess it's time to show you... more... Grr, this thing is pretty tricky to remove. You have to press down hard.
Removing this is a lot harder than you'd expect. Of course, my shorts can stay in place without the safety piece here, but...
Uh oh... I think you might've ran into a bug. Please report it.
Well, I suppose you all earned it. Just don't go rushing to the tabloids.
I don't think you all know how lucky you are... What happens here stays here. None of you are to say a word, capiche?
I'm really not keen to get naked, but rules are rules and I'm not an exception. Plus, I'm not at all ashamed of my body.
Go ahead. Appreciate it.
I am the Shining Beauty. And that, Starfire, was a coat of genuine Ampharos wool. Fashionable and soft.
I am the Shining Beauty. And there's more than one way to demonstrate that, Cynthia.
What do you mean? I already am regretting it.
Maybe you're secretly a Pokemon, too.
That's... not what I meant. But call it what you like.
I won't do that, but at least I know you like what you see.
If you want to see more, come see it for yourself, Starfire.
I'm still in the game, aren't I? Oooh, I guess you can consider it my Final Gambit. Alright, I'm ready!
Ooooh, this actually feels liberating! Of course this is a one-time thing, but I think I can get used to this for now!
I'm not eliminated from this game yet? That means I might just have a chance.
I am the Shining Beauty. And if you think I'm hogging all the attention, then by all means. Have your fun.
I dare you to try.
More just ambiance than anything, Jessie.
If you're brave enough to try, I can refer you to a retailer.
Hmm... maybe I should start telling some more jokes, then.
Duly noted, Akko.
Would you like me to?
...And no, Misty. It didn't work out.
Ah, well. Can't act aloof forever with you around, Misty.
Maybe it's because there's a familiar face around.
There's certainly a liberating factor to it.
They call me the Shining Beauty! Not someone cute.
Judging by that look on your face, at least one.
You didn't peg me as the type to use headphones.
Ah, well. I'm proud of my legs.
Maybe I'm getting too into this now...
Heh, feel free to admire my backside while you're at it.
No, you can't! Those are expensive, I'll have you know.
I am the Shining Beauty. And I'd prefer you call me that over Sparkplug.
A Dragon Buster? So are you an Ice or Fairy specialist?
Sounds like someone could use a haircut.
Oh, if only you knew the stunning grace of a Zebstrika...
The bra is built-in, you see... I didn't go without just for the sake of pleasing a stranger.
Just get the staring over with.
I am the Shining Beauty. And while I prefer the glitz and glamor of Nimbasa City, thank you for the kind words.
You're one to talk, Miss Poofy Hat.
Only fashion at its finest.
The bra's built-in... although, going without is perfectly acceptable, too.
Give it some time, and you may even come to look like me!
They call me the Shining Beauty. Let's have a clean game, Futaba.
Well, if you want recommendations, leave it to me!
I'm fashionable in all fields. But if you want to see me naked... well, you'll need to focus more!
I'll let it fall like so... and perhaps I can teach you that as well, Futaba.
With how much skin models show on a regular basis? It'd be weirder not to shave.
I am the Shining Beauty. And I won't lose to anyone, least of all this shrimp of a girl.
You need to look for a fashion that suits you. Get what I mean?
That's why you gotta be picky with what you choose. And there's nothing wrong with the cheaper option, but you didn't hear that from me.
Ah, there we are. Oh my, jealous, Natsuki?
Yeah, there was a bra in there. Convenient for me. And very convenient for you, Natsuki.
Ah, thought so. Still, since she's not here, I'll be sure to dazzle the rest of you!
I'd be glad to give your work a listen if you can show me where to find it.
I am the Shining Beauty. I may not be "Number One", but I'll still stand out!
But now, it falls.
Really? I think you should give it a chance. Worst case scenario, you can grow it back, right?
I am the Shining Beauty. But that's nothing to be afraid of.
At least you have solid taste.
Can't help it now, I guess.
Because that's the idea.
No. It's got a built-in bra, so it's actually quite convenient!
Well, if you're not just saying that, thank you.
Oh, if only you knew the stunning grace of a Zebstrika...
They can be a hassle sometimes anyways. But these wireless headphones? I treasure them dearly.
You may have beaten me this round, but don't think I'll be a pushover.
It'll take more than one loss to outmatch the Shining Beauty.
I'm keeping these on for the rest of the game, by the way. Those things are expensive, and they complete my general aesthetic.
Oh, and don't start calling this Foul Play. I'm actually keeping these headphones on for the entire game.
Are you interested? I wasn't expecting that...
What? Did you think I was all serious, all the time? I'm more than that.
You know, it's not often I get the chance to enjoy other's company.
These tights are actually pretty thick. Perfect for staying stylish during the winter.
There we go. You may have gotten me down to just my top and underwear, but you still have quite a ways to go.
I wish I didn't have to take these off, and not just because my panties are visible now. They were so warm and comfy...

Thanks, ~player~! That's all I need here.
...What? Enjoying the view?
There we go. Thank you, ~player~! I'm glad you didn't get hands-y with me. Looking is free, but touching will cost you.
These headphones are also wireless. Aside from being able to block out unnecessarily loud noises, I could play music or simply white noise.
After all, to be a model, you need confidence in yourself and confidence in your body!
I am the Shining Beauty. And you will know that by the end of the night.
Are you interested? I wasn't expecting that...
What? Did you think I was all serious, all the time? I'm more than that.
You know, it's not often I get the chance to enjoy other's company.
There! Now I can simply sliiiide them down---like so!
There we go. You may have gotten me down to just my top and underwear, but you still have quite a ways to go.
Ahh. Without the safety piece, I can simply slide them down my legs like so. No hands required.
I don't mean to brag, but I've made headphones an iconic look soon after my debut as a gym leader.
I could get used to this.
Be cautious with those---you'd be surprised how costly designer headphones are.
And before you ask: Yes, I was wearing a bra. It's simply built-in with my top.
This crop-top has a built-in bra. Normally, it's quite convenient, but in this case... now you get to see my breasts sooner. Let's just deal the next hand.

No bra? How scandalous!
...Actually, this top does have a bra built-in to it. It's very convenient for when you're changing or getting ready for bed.
Heh, feel free to admire my backside while you're at it.
Here, I'll be generous and turn around too.
I'm still in the game, aren't I? Oooh, I guess you can consider it my Final Gambit. Alright, I'm ready!
Ooooh, this actually feels liberating! Of course this is a one-time thing, but I think I can get used to this for now!
I'm not eliminated from this game yet? That means I might just have a chance.
You're up.
Ah, so it's ~name~'s time to shine.
What will it be this time?
Looks like this hand pulled through for me!
There's no crying in strip poker!
Don't be shy now.
It's all you, ~name~.
Your time to shine.
Well... go on.
Pick anything.
What'll it be?
I see it's ~name~'s turn.
Don't let me distract you now.
Ah... Better luck next time.
I wasn't distracting you, was I?
You're up.
Ah, so it's ~name~'s time to shine.
What will it be this time?
Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
There's no crying in strip poker!

state.text: You don't seem to be wearing much.

case.state: Please don't waste our time.
Make it at least a little interesting, okay?
Know what you're picking?
You're up!
Ah, so it's ~name~'s time to shine.
Unlucky! Well, someone has to lose.
Alright, let's roll! Show us how it's done, ~name~!
What will it be this time?
There's no crying in strip poker!
You've got this.
Let's go.
What would I do if I were in your shoes?
I see it's ~name~'s turn.
Don't let me distract you now.
Ah... Better luck next time.
I wasn't distracting you, was I?
Oh! That doesn't happen every day.
Oh, there's a tie. So what happens now?
A tie!? What happens here?
Oh wow! It's just as rare as encountering a shiny Pokemon, isn't it?
I didn't think that would ever happen in our game! What is even the probability of this?
I'm surprised you're even here to begin with, let alone agreeing to play strip poker.
Is that cube important to you, or are you simply wearing it for aesthetic reasons?
That hair must be a hassle to handle if you're having trouble removing that pendant.
...What a shame. I mean that.
Oh, please.
...That's all, huh?
(sigh) You've gotten me excited, and now you're letting me down.
Oh... I mean, well... Don't let me distract you then.
I'm actually disappointed now.
Ah, seriously!?
Surely you can't be serious.
Seriously? I know you can do better.
You're not turning any heads, you know.
You've got me yawning over here.

state.text: ...I did not pick up on anything you said.

case.state: Slow down, you speak too quickly!

state.text: I'm willing to give you a second chance if you've truly reformed. Let's hope I don't regret this.

case.state: Have you considered cutting off your ponytail?
(Didn't the hero of Unova wear a similar hat?)
Always next time.
From the top.
Carry on, once again.
Ugh.
Let's just move on. I don't like wasting precious time.
Next time you decide to remove an accessory, please remove it quicker.
You know, it's sort of irritating when I've exposed myself to you and you remove something so small.
Sure, I can see the value of accessories. But I'm not about that in this game!
Maybe we should start applying more pressure...
You're really gonna skimp out now?
True. I'm still disappointed, but I'm also going to assume that's your only accessory, so I guess I have no room to complain.
You'll never stand out with such a weak choice.
Hardly befitting of anyone.
...So that's all, huh?
(sigh)
Right. You still had that. Your ~clothing~.
(sigh) You've gotten me excited, and now you're letting me down.
Seriously!? I'm actually feeling a bit betrayed here!
Surely you can't be serious.
Good choice. Not exactly exciting, but it'll make the end all the sweeter.
Smart. But boring.
A solid move!
No room to flee now!
Try not to disappoint me again. It's hard to ease yourself into this when you pull off moves like that.
Mind if I get a closer look? At your ~clothing~, I mean.
Feel free to get fancier.
Whatever.
You're really letting me down here. I'm here to have fun, not watch someone remove their ~clothing~.
This feels like stalling. I guess I have no room to judge. (I still wish they could've taken off something bigger.)
Would you like recommendations for your next choice?
There's always next time, I suppose.
Something better next time, please.
You're removing both your socks and your shoes?
Really? Of all things?
Weak...
And I expected more...
I guess I can deal with that.
At least it's something.
Well, I guess that's no problem for you.
It's the small victories, I suppose.
Not bad. But also not good.
It's... something? I dunno.
Ah, right, the eight-item limit.
You're more of a funnyman than an actual clown.
You can take the real thing off at any time.
Ugh. How disappointing.
Exquisite. Sublime. Next.
Want a reward? Too bad.
Look, I know you can do better. So... do better.
You're really intent on leaving me high and dry, huh?
Not that I got my hopes up, but seriously?
So that's how it's gonna be, huh?
My fault for getting my hopes up, I suppose.
Well, not a total waste of time.
Perhaps I should lead by example next time.
It's... an okay choice, I suppose.
I see you're playing to win.
I'll let it pass, if you promise a better performance later.
Surely, that's not the best you can provide.
So many ways you can improve...
Keep it up. You're doing great!
You'll get the hang of it in no time!
Just work your way up to the big stuff.
I'm a little jealous you still had something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Hello...
Ooh, niiiiccceee.
Now this is the good stuff!
That's the spirit!
I'll be watching closely!

It could be worse... This is... Ooooh...

I can have fun too, you know! Pretending to be cold and aloof all the time to keep your distance from other people gets a little tiring after a while, but that's the modeling career for you!
Mmm... This is nice.
Haaaah...
Ohhhh, regardless of the situation, this---oh---this is so nice...
I sort of wish I kept my headphones. Some music would really help out here.
Ahh... Two fingers---mmm---usually do it for me...
Nipples are such... sensitive things...
Ohhhh gosh!
I don't like having my body on display, but I have to admit... Having an audience here makes for an interesting experience.
Mmm... Mmmmm! Always gets the body tingling.
Ooooh... Feels like little jolts of pleasure, traveling from my clit... to my breasts to... the rest of me!
A-Ah!
I like to imagine little sparks traveling up my body while doing this. It makes both sexy and fun!
This might be it! My body...!
Oooh... I'm so close... These sparks are getting more intense!
Haaa---ahhh! Almost here! I'm almost at my peak!
Ohhh yes, I'm getting there! I'm so close! I... I can't even think straight...
Ahhh... I'm... not gonna last here! My body's...
Oh my... Here it comes, here it comes!
Oh yes! AAAAAAaaaahhhh!
Yes! Yes! Ahhh! AaaaAAAAaaaaaaAAAHHHhhh!
Can't deny I enjoyed it.
You didn't. But my head did spin...
Last round of the game! Ooooh, how exciting! I wonder who will win?
Whew! I'm actually a little lightheaded after that. Give me a moment.
That was... wow. I always enjoyed using toys but using my fingers felt just as good---umm, never mind. Ignore that!
Oh wow... I might need a moment.
Y'know, there's a body of water nearby. And we're in a private venue. Maybe we can go skinny-dipping!
We could use a spotlight here! It's kind of hard to see, y'know.
Can we get some lighting here?
Brrr... It's pretty chilly here.
Damn. Now I wish I kept my coat. It was so warm too...
Oooh, why don't we relax in the springs once the game is over!
Oh... So we're have to wait until the game is done? Well, this puts a damper on the rest of the game for me.
Wait... Do I seriously just stand here and wait until the game is over? Well that's boring.
Whew! That was actually pretty fun, all things considered!
So what now?
That felt pretty great! Maybe I should let loose like this more often... in private, of course.
Even if the act was meant to be shameful, that still made my head spin!
Hmm... What next?
This is one hell of a game we're playing.
Damn... I might have been a little pent-up!
Did you enjoy the show?
Let's have someone else take the spotlight now!
I could go for some carrots and hummus right now.
Let's see how this goes!
Can I put my headphones back on? I'd like to listen to some white noise.

I feel the need---the need for speed!
...In other words, can this be over already?

You guys remember that quote from Forrest Gump?
"Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get."
This certainly wasn't how I planned to spend this ~weekday~ evening...
Nice try, Guzma. Maybe you'll have better luck in battles.
Hmm. This was a little entertaining. Thanks for tonight.
Seriously, good game everyone! I had my doubts, but I'm glad I came here.

state.text: A shining group of opponents, you turned out to be. Perhaps if we ever play again, you'll be able to see all of me!

case.state: And there's curtains, everyone! Still, you got to see me naked, which is its own reward. Right?
I'll have to decline; what I've done today was risky enough... unless you have somewhere private rented out for us girls?
Sure. Contact my agency and your credentials, and I'm sure they can set something up. Oh, what's your schedule like? I'm busy most days.
Losing to you? How humiliating...
Somehow, I'm okay with this outcome.
Well played, Cynthia. See you in Undella Town?
Damn, I was this close to winning too. Ah, well, at least we all had fun. Well done, ~name~!
Second place isn't so bad, I suppose. Well-played, ~name~! I may not have a Bolt Badge to give you, but this was even better, right?
Ah, well done! I may not have a Bolt Badge to give you, but this was even better, right?
(Those look... positively brutal.)
